title: Design Principles for Mobile Microlearning Platforms: Short-Intensive Courses in Scientific Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and competency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Science vocational training utilizing smartphones in PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy through micro-content within 5 minutes.
Learners can complete three or more interactive learning activities following a sequential instructional flow.
Learners can apply scientific knowledge learned in a mobile environment to real-world cases through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
